definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: A home-made typewriter costs less than an imported one maybe.
sentences.chinese: 我们国产打字机可能要比进口的便宜。

sentences.english: The typewriter rescued him, at least for a time.
sentences.chinese: 打字机挽救了他，起码一度挽救过他。

sentences.english: Janet pulled the page from her typewriter and looked nervously at her wrist-watch.
sentences.chinese: 简尼特从她的打字机里抽出纸，紧张地看了看手表。

sentences.english: What is the rent for a type-writer?
She took up a sheet and ratcheted it into the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 她拿起一张纸，把它哗哗啦啦地塞到打字机中。

sentences.english: I heard the typewriter clacking in the next office.
sentences.chinese: 我听见隔壁办公室中打字机发出嗒嗒的声音。

sentences.english: I bought a plastic cover for a typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 我买了一个打字机的塑料外罩。

sentences.english: She sat at her typewriter all night tooling up the final draft.
sentences.chinese: 她整夜坐在打字机帝，校订成稿。

sentences.english: A keyboard-operated typeset ting machine that sets separate characters.
sentences.chinese: 排列单个字母的键盘操作打字机。

sentences.english: This computer normally consists of a teletypewriter.
sentences.chinese: 通常，这种计算机包括一台电传打字机。

sentences.english: Evelyn threaded paper in the machine and began typing.
sentences.chinese: 艾弗琳把纸放进打字机里，开始打字。

sentences.english: My mother playing the piano, my dad's prehistoric Selectric.
sentences.chinese: 母亲弹奏钢琴的声音，父亲史前打字机的声音。

sentences.english: His father bought an Uuderwood last week.
sentences.chinese: 上周他父亲买了台安德伍德牌打字机。

sentences.english: The typewriter was rattling away so loudly that we could not fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 打字机嗒嗒地响个不停，吵得人不能入睡。

sentences.english: I went back to page one, girded up my typewriter and my critical faculty and started over.
sentences.chinese: 我重返第一页，黏着打字机，努力工作，从头开始。

sentences.english: She'll make do with the old typewriter until the new one arrives.
sentences.chinese: 新打字机到之前她将凑合着用旧的。
